reviews.review: Best game ever and ive played all kind of fps and battleroyale games like pubg and bo but this is the best and this is cheap

The millennial version of Counter Strike. Where skins and other b***s*** mean more than the game-play. Probably one of the most overrated games of recent times.

Do yourself a favour, play Source.
